module.description: AUX Sensor Control Engine (AUX_SCE) is a RISC-style microprocessor with separate fetch and execution cycles. It is optimized for low power and simple operations. AUX_SCE code and data segments are stored in AUX_RAM. AON_PMCTL:AUXSCECLK sets the operational frequency.
